plot: Two teams of three stand-up comedians take the news from the last 7 days and do what they do best - take the piss out of everything and everyone.
plot_en: Two teams of three stand-up comedians take the news from the last 7 days and do what they do best - take the piss out of everything and everyone.
plot_es: Two teams of three stand-up comedians take the news from the last 7 days and do what they do best - take the piss out of everything and everyone.
title: 7 Days
